verses.text: Jacob \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w went|strong="H7725"\w* \w on|strong="H4725"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* journey \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w had|strong="H0853"\w* begun: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* angels \w of|strong="H1121"\w* God met \w him|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w when|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* saw \w them|strong="H1870"\w*, \w he|strong="H0430"\w* said: These \w are|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* camps \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* called \w the|strong="H1870"\w* name \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w that|strong="H1980"\w* place Mahanaim, \w that|strong="H1980"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w*, Camps.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w sent|strong="H0559"\w* messengers \w before|strong="H0430"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w Esau|strong="H0559"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* brother \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Seir \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w country|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Edom:

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w he|strong="H7971"\w* commanded \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, saying: Thus \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* ye speak \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H7971"\w* lord \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*: Thus saith thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*: \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* sojourned \w with|strong="H0413"\w* Laban, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w been|strong="H0776"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* until this day.

\w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* oxen, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* asses, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* sheep, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* menservants, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* womenservants: \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* send \w a|strong="H5704"\w* message \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w my|strong="H3290"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w may|strong="H3541"\w* find favour \w in|strong="H5650"\w* thy sight.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0113"\w* \w messengers|strong="H5046"\w* returned \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H7971"\w*, saying: \w We|strong="H4672"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Esau thy brother, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* behold \w he|strong="H7971"\w* cometh \w with|strong="H1961"\w* speed \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w meet|strong="H4672"\w* thee \w with|strong="H1961"\w* four hundred \w men|strong="H5650"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1980"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w was|strong="H0376"\w* greatly afraid; \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* fear divided \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w people|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w was|strong="H0376"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* flocks, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* sheep, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* oxen, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* camels, \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w two|strong="H3967"\w* companies,

Saying: \w If|strong="H0834"\w* Esau come \w to|strong="H0854"\w* \w one|strong="H0834"\w* \w company|strong="H4264"\w* \w and|strong="H6629"\w* destroy \w it|strong="H0834"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w other|strong="H8147"\w* \w company|strong="H4264"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* left \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* escape.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w O|strong="H0518"\w* \w God|strong="H0559"\w* \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* father \w Abraham|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w God|strong="H0559"\w* \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* father \w Isaac|strong="H0559"\w*, \w O|strong="H0518"\w* Lord, \w who|strong="H6413"\w* saidst \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Return|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thy land \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w place|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H4264"\w* thy birth, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w do|strong="H0518"\w* well \w for|strong="H0413"\w* thee,

\w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H0776"\w* worthy \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* least \w of|strong="H0776"\w* all thy mercies, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy truth which thou hast fulfilled \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thy servant. \w With|strong="H5973"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* staff \w I|strong="H0776"\w* passed \w over|strong="H0413"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* Jordan; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H3327"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* two companies.

Deliver \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hand \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* brother Esau, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* greatly afraid \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*: lest \w perhaps|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* kill \w the|strong="H3605"\w* mother \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* children.

Thou didst say \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou wouldst \w do|strong="H3027"\w* well \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* multiply \w my|strong="H5921"\w* seed \w like|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sand \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sea, which cannot \w be|strong="H1121"\w* numbered \w for|strong="H3588"\w* multitude.

\w And|strong="H3220"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* slept \w there|strong="H7230"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* night, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* apart, \w of|strong="H2233"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w things|strong="H5973"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w*, presents \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* brother \w Esau|strong="H0559"\w*.
\w Two|strong="H3947"\w* hundred \w she|strong="H1931"\w* goats, twenty \w he|strong="H1931"\w* goats, \w two|strong="H3947"\w* hundred ewes, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* twenty rams,

Thirty milch camels \w with|strong="H6242"\w* their colts, forty kine, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* bulls, \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* she asses, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* ten \w of|strong="H3967"\w* their foals.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1121"\w* sent \w them|strong="H1121"\w* \w by|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* hands \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1121"\w* servants, every drove \w by|strong="H1121"\w* itself, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1121"\w* said \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1121"\w* servants: Go before \w me|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* let there \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H1121"\w* space between drove \w and|strong="H1121"\w* drove.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w first|strong="H6440"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w If|strong="H7760"\w* thou \w meet|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* brother \w Esau|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w ask|strong="H0559"\w* thee: \w Whose|strong="H5650"\w* art thou? \w or|strong="H0996"\w* whither goest thou? \w or|strong="H0996"\w* \w whose|strong="H5650"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w these|strong="H7760"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee?

Thou shalt \w answer|strong="H0559"\w*: Thy servant Jacob’s: \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w sent|strong="H6680"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* present \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* lord \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*: \w and|strong="H0251"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* cometh \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5650"\w* like manner \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* second \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* third, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w all|strong="H2009"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* droves, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Speak|strong="H0559"\w* ye \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* words \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*, \w when|strong="H7971"\w* ye find \w him|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* ye \w shall|strong="H2088"\w* add: Thy servant \w Jacob|strong="H0559"\w* \w himself|strong="H0413"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* followeth \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*: \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w he|strong="H0310"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* appease \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* presents \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w afterwards|strong="H0310"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* see \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, perhaps \w he|strong="H0310"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* gracious \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w presents|strong="H7200"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H0310"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w himself|strong="H6440"\w* lodged \w that|strong="H3588"\w* night \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* camp.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* rising early \w he|strong="H1931"\w* took \w his|strong="H5921"\w* two wives, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* two handmaids, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* eleven sons, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* ford \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Jaboc.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w when|strong="H5674"\w* \w all|strong="H0259"\w* \w things|strong="H8147"\w* \w were|strong="H0802"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w over|strong="H6965"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* belonged \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*,
\w He|strong="H0834"\w* remained alone: \w and|strong="H0853"\w* behold \w a|strong="H3947"\w* man wrestled \w with|strong="H3947"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* till morning.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w when|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* saw \w that|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w could|strong="H0376"\w* not overcome \w him|strong="H5973"\w*, \w he|strong="H5704"\w* touched \w the|strong="H5704"\w* sinew \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* thigh, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* forthwith \w it|strong="H5704"\w* shrank.

\w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* said \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*: \w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* go, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3709"\w* break \w of|strong="H3709"\w* day. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* answered: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* thee go \w except|strong="H3808"\w* thou bless \w me|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w What|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H7837"\w* thy \w name|strong="H0559"\w*? \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Jacob|strong="H0559"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0559"\w* \w he|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w shall|strong="H4100"\w* not \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w called|strong="H0559"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w but|strong="H0559"\w* Israel: \w for|strong="H0413"\w* if thou hast been strong \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w God|strong="H0559"\w*, \w how|strong="H4100"\w* \w much|strong="H4100"\w* more shalt thou prevail \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w men|strong="H0559"\w*?

\w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w asked|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*, \w Tell|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H5973"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w what|strong="H3588"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* art thou \w called|strong="H0559"\w*? \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Why|strong="H3588"\w* dost thou \w ask|strong="H0559"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*? \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* blessed \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w same|strong="H8034"\w* place.

\w And|strong="H8033"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w called|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w place|strong="H8033"\w* Phanuel, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w have|strong="H8034"\w* seen \w God|strong="H0559"\w* face \w to|strong="H0559"\w* face, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w my|strong="H3290"\w* soul \w has|strong="H4100"\w* been saved.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* immediately \w the|strong="H6440"\w* sun rose \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w after|strong="H0413"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* past Phanuel; \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* halted \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* foot.

\w Therefore|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* children \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Israel, unto \w this|strong="H1931"\w* day, eat not \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sinew, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* shrank \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Jacob’s \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w*: \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* touched \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sinew \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w* \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* shrank.
